inclusion.criterion: Classic bladder exstrophy with successful primary, secondary, or delayed primary closure and subsequent epispadias repair.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Urinalysis and urine culture demonstrating either no bacterial growth or growth of an organism that can be treated with an appropriate oral antibiotic for 7 days preoperatively.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine in normal range for age (Infant: 0.2-0.4 mg/dl; Child 0.3-0.7 mg/dl; Adolescent 0.5-1.0 mg/dl).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative Study Donor Virology Panel (Hep B surface antigen, HIV 1 / 2 antibody, Hep B core antibody, Rapid Plasma Reagin (RPR), Human T-cell Lymphotrophic Virus (HTLV) I / II antibody, Hep C antibody).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Parent or legal guardian who is, in the opinion of the investigator, reliable and willing to make themselves and patient available for the duration of the study and are willing to follow study procedures and unit policies.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Parent or legal guardian able to complete and sign the informed consent document.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative pregnancy test for sexual active female teenagers. If able to conceive and sexually active, participants must agree to use barrier contraceptives from the time of study enrollment until 6 months after the last MDC injection.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male participants who are able to conceive and are sexually active must agree to use protection as well from the time of study enrollment until 6 months after the last MDC injection.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Urodynamic study demonstrating severe uninhibited bladder contractions.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe urethral or bladder neck stricture demonstrated during screening cystoscopy or cystogram
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He currently has a severe 2cm bulbar urethral stricture.
